website_summaries.verdict: A smart power strip that is simple to control via mobile app.
pros: Offers a surge protection function and effective absorption of sudden high voltage
Includes both regular and USB outlets
Provides a timer that you can use to schedule the power cord to turn on and off for seamless power management
cons: Can only control the 4 USB ports together

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, very easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first Alexa-WIFI power adapter. I decided on the 3 port plug and 4 port USB charger so I could set it next to the couch, charge stuff but also turn on/off the light. Setup was very easy... this is not like setting up a Google Chromecast where you have to connect to a separate WIFI network then switch back. You basically hold your phone close to the adapter to set it up. Then, follow the directions to enable Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Never connected.
customer_reviews.text: Tried multiple ways to connect ... for an hour. Eventually gave up. The instructions suck... getting my money back
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product BUT stopped working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: One of the outlet stopped working after 10 months of usage. Others are working fine. ORIGINAL COMMENT: Amazing product which is very easy to configure.. It paired successfully with my wifi and setup was very simple via Google Home. Now I can turn on/off lights and tv via voice command. Neat home automation..
customer_reviews.author: Raks

customer_reviews.title: Phone control
customer_reviews.text: A magical Power Strip! 4 USB charging ports I can charge both phones and my iPad at the same time! The other 3 outlets power socket can also plug in other appliances! The most amazing place is that I can use the phone to control them! It can be used as a very common power strip, and also can be a smart one, it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: evan chau

customer_reviews.title: After 10 months update
customer_reviews.text: 10 months into owning this product update: it finally gave out on me, to be honest I had no complaints at all until it finally gave out today. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: it is still working after 1 month of use. It was easy to be configured to connect to google home with the instruction provided. It stays connected to my google home and never disconnect by itself. All usb ports are still usable. The quality of material use is good because I dropped it on the floor couple times and it is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Hon Wong

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 plugs work for remote control
customer_reviews.text: Got my strip to automate my lights with fan, 2 out of the 3 plugs worked just fine, the 3rd plug stays on constantly and cannot be programmed or turned off remotely. Great concept but I think I got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaRN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and have been using more than a month now. I have connected it to my Google home mini and my commands are instantenous with the Power strip. You can easily set commands or tasks for each port independently except USB ports, which operate as one port. Great product overall, especially at such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Bakhishov

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to connect to my WIFI and can access it from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Heselton

customer_reviews.title: Works great, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Had this product a few months and so far so good. Like that it had several charging options
customer_reviews.author: AYSOT

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: this is my first set of smart plugs.It‘s easy to set up.I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Warning: works great but
customer_reviews.text: Alexa can only turn all connections on or off at the same time Only the app can address the separate sockets and the USB group individually.
customer_reviews.author: KR Santa Monica

customer_reviews.title: Value to money!!
customer_reviews.text: This smart power strip is amazing! Hooked up to the smart life app in seconds and Alexa recognized it right away! Controls my lights with no issues!! thanks
customer_reviews.author: Aslam

product_meta.title: WiFi Power Strip Smart Surge Protector Compatible with Alexa/Google Home 3 AC Wireless Outlets (90-264V/15A) APP Individually Remote Control Smart Plug with Long Extension Cord No Hub Required Timer
product_meta.description:
Specifications: 
. Material: Fire-resistant and high temprature-resistant ABS material 
. Max Power: 2000W 
. AC Power Output: AC 90-264V/15A 
. USB Max Output: 5V / 4A 
. Wireless Frequency: 2.4GHz 
. Compatible System: iOS 8.0 or higher/Android 4.1 or higher 
. Working Temp.: -20~80°C 
. Size: 10.3" x 1.96" x 1.1" 
. Power Cable Length: 1.8m / 5.9ft 
. Weight: 0.78lb 

What's in the box? 
1 x WiFi Smart Power Strip 
1 x Instructions Manual 

Warm Tips: 
1. Please ensure that the working power is less than the rated power 1875W. 
2. The 3 outlets can be controlled individually while the 4 USB ports are controlled as a one unit.
feature_bullets: 【Sync with Alexa/Google home】This wifi smart power strip can be controller by free Smart Life APP, sync with Alexa/Google home by voice control. Ultra-easy to control.

【Timer for Schedule】Schedule the devices plug to this power strip to on or off individually on a setting time automatically, prevent overcharging, keep your coffee machine on in the morning, overload protection to make sure your devices run a long time and safer.

【Wireless Remove Control Anywhere】You can control the 3 smart plugs together or individually with smart phone by Wifi/3G/4G network anywhere and anytime. But you can only control the 4 USB ports together. Support 2.4GHz WiFi network, does not support 5.0GHz.
【Surge Protection】This smart power strip has surge protection function, effective absorption of the sudden high voltage, protecting the connection equipment
【Customer Service】FCC, RoSH, CE certificated, 12 months warranty and lifetime technical support , please don't hesitate and purchase without worries.
